downloadTitle: Microsoft Lync Online Voice and Video Training
downloadDescription: Learn about Microsoft Lync Online voice and video features, and how to use the controls.

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Lync Online Voice and Video Training.pptx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/3/3/0/330f7581-4b0f-481d-af2f-245d75e2cbb5/Microsoft Lync Online Voice and Video Training.pptx

detailsSection:
This training course covers the following Microsoft Lync Online voice features:
  • Make a call
  • Answer a call
  • Manage a call
  • Start a conference call
  • Start, join or accept a video Call
  • Add video to an existing conversation
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Lync Online Voice and Video Training.pptx
installInstructionSection: To install this download, save the file to a directory on your computer. After you save the file, open the presentation as you typically would. To remove this download, delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
